theme: एष हि द्रष्टा स्प्रष्टा श्रोता घ्राता रसयिता मन्ता बोद्धा कर्ता विज्ञानात्मा पुरुषः  (प्रश्नो. ४-९), अथ यो वेदेदं जिघ्राणीति स आत्मा । ( छान्दो. ८-१२-४)अथ यो वेदेदं मन्वानीति स आत्मा ( छान्दो. ८-१२-५)
meaning: Explanation: This verse indicates that there is limitation to our knowledge. It implies that we as human beings have limited understanding and are not capable of comprehending the ultimate reality or absolute truth. Our knowledge is restricted by our limited perception, intellect, and capabilities. Therefore, we should acknowledge our limitations and approach our pursuit of knowledge with humility and openness.
